definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
recorded media (CD and DVD)/sound and movies

sentences.english: Then decline tone, she is a big mouth to fight over.
sentences.chinese: 话没落音，她就是一个大嘴巴打过来。

sentences.english: There are two naturals in this chord.
sentences.chinese: 这一和弦中有两个本位音。

sentences.english: Don't remove to other Forums, Blogs and Baidu. Thanks.
sentences.chinese: 站内公告，请不要转出云音，谢谢。

sentences.english: You must pronounce every sound accurately.
sentences.chinese: 你必须精确地读好每一个音。

sentences.english: When there are two people, they can harmonize.
sentences.chinese: 对了，只要有两个人，就可以唱和音。

sentences.english: For the first album, it was mostly my tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但是第一张专辑里大部分录的是我的音。

sentences.english: Life is a foreign language: All men mispronounce it.
sentences.chinese: 生活是一门外语，谁都不能发好它的音。

sentences.english: It was one of the most thrilling discords I ever heard.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有听见过这样叫人发抖的不协和音。

sentences.english: Metal delivers the explosive roar of US high-gain metal sound.
sentences.chinese: 模拟爆炸性的美制高增益金属音。

sentences.english: The ascending diatonic scale is the scale going up by step from lower to higher frequencies or pitches.
sentences.chinese: 上行自然音阶为依次由低到高上升的音。

sentences.english: Where are the gods of Sepharvaim, Hena and Ivvah?
sentences.chinese: 西法瓦音，希拿，以瓦的神在哪里呢？

sentences.english: The most workable register is the upper chalameaux.
sentences.chinese: 最容易开始练习的是上节管区域的音。

sentences.english: Omission of a final or initial sound in pronunciation.
Befriending music will now play for bunnymen and chess creatures.
sentences.chinese: 兔子人和棋子类生物会有友好的效果音。

sentences.english: Admission is based on an application and an audition in the spring of the year prior to admittance .
sentences.chinese: 入学依据的是一个应用和音，在春天的前一年纳。

sentences.english: Take time to laugh, It is the music of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 花些时间欢笑，它是心靈的音樂。

definition: sound duration/length of a musical note
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
falling and rising tone/third tone in modern Mandarin
falling tone/fourth tone in modern Mandarin
the four tones of Middle Chinese: level tone 平聲|平声, rising tone 上聲|上声, departing tone 去聲|去声 and entering tone 入聲|入声/the four tones of Modern Standard Mandarin
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
